channel.title: Can't connect to Server 639
channel.description:
I tried to connect to Server on VPS with client, and I got this message in black box, when I did click ''login'' button... No clue what's wrong, because 1minute earlier worked fine on my computer (LocalHost)
[code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\root\ecogames\oopsdsd.bin (The system ca nnot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at org.dementhium.io.FileUtilities.writeBufferToFile(FileUtilities.java: 38) at org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.save(PlayerLoader.java:150) at org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.load(PlayerLoader.java:107) at org.dementhium.model.World$1.run(World.java:212) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: Can't connect to Server 639
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

Oops… I clicked login by accident twice~ So it is not doubled^_^ … Anyways any suggestions how to make it work? Did happen also with other source… So this did happen with both…

item.title: Can't connect to Server 639

item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

In the code it says 2 times it cannot find the path…Fix that first, use eclipse
